/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC  -DGVIRTUS_HOME=\"/home/cldemo/guaitolini/virtual_mirror_GVirtus/GVirtuS\" -shared -Wl,-soname,libgvirtus-plugin-cusolver.so -o libgvirtus-plugin-cusolver.so "CMakeFiles/gvirtus-plugin-cusolver.dir/backend/CusolverHandler.cpp.o"   -L/home/cldemo/guaitolini/virtual_mirror_GVirtus/GVirtuS/lib  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/liblog4cplus.so ../../libgvirtus-communicators.so /usr/local/cuda-12.6/lib64/libcusolver.so ../../libgvirtus-common.so -lstdc++fs -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/liblog4cplus.so -lrdmacm -libverbs /usr/local/cuda-12.6/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libculibos.a /usr/local/cuda-12.6/lib64/libcusparse.so /usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libnvJitLink.so /usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcublasLt.so
